title: Netflix Clon
shortDescription: FullStack Netflix Clone using NextJS to watch free shortfilms....
description: FullStack Netflix Clone using NextJS, Typescript, NextAuth and implements MongoDB & Prisma connect for database administration

title: Memories
shortDescription: Memories is a CRUD app to share memories of moments you would like to remember...
description: Memories is a CRUD app to share memories of moments you would like to remember such as a trip, a party with friends or the day you adopted your pet. features of the app include a global view to see all the memories created by users and a view to manage the ones you have created.

title: Shop app
shortDescription: The project is a yard sale page that consumes an API to get different products...
description: this app was created as a project for Platzi's React course. The project is a yard sale page that consumes an API to get different products where you can save the ones you would like to buy.

title: Currency app
shortDescription: Application created using NextJS 13 to check the value of different dollar rates against the value of the Argentine peso....
description: Application created using NextJS 13 to check the value of different dollar rates against the value of the argentine peso and manage expenses. The application uses a web scraper to keep dollar prices updated.

title: Social network main page
shortDescription: Social Network main page created using React and Material UI...
description: This application was created to practice styling using Styled components and Material UI with custom themes. The page is responsive design and has dark mode implemented.

title: Movies
shortDescription: Movies is a challenge from Alkemy. the application displays a list of movies...
description: Movies is a challenge from Alkemy. The application displays a list of movies where you can see details of each one and add it to a list of favorites. You can search for movies using a search bar.

title: Rest countries challenge
shortDescription: My solution to the REST Countries API challenge...
description: My solution to the REST Countries API challenge that includes features like search bar, select button to filter countries by region and detailed information by clicking on a country.

title: Quiz game
shortDescription: Simple quiz game created using vanilla javascript...
description: Simple quiz game created using JS vanilla and OOP paradigm.

title: Sketch-pad
shortDescription: Sketchpad created using plain HTML, CSS and Javascript...
description: Sketchpad created using plain HTML, CSS and Javascript to make pixel art.

title: Wave Portal
shortDescription: Dapp created to interact with wave smart contract...
description: Dapp created to interact with wave smart contract, you can connect with your ethereum wallet and leave a message that will be stored in the Goerli testnet blockchain.

title: NFT Collection
shortDescription: Project where users can connect with their Ethereum wallet and mint an NFT...
description: Project where users can connect with their Ethereum wallet and mint an NFT to see it later on Open Sea.
